DOC.brief_summary: A comparison between local and intraperitoneal analgetics to placebo, during laparoscopy, regarding post operative pain.
DOC.brief_title: Local and Intraperitoneal Analgetics in Gynecologic Laparoscopy for Post Operative Pain Relief
DOC.detailed_description: 4 randomly assigned groups. Grop 1 will get sub cutaneous and intraperitoneal marcain. Grop 2 will get sub cutaneous marcaine and intraperitoneal saline. Grop 3 will get sub cutaneus saline and intraperitoneal marcaine. Grop 4 will get ub cutaneous and intraperitoneal saline
DOC.criteria: Elective laparoscopy Laparotomy Vaginal operations Oncologic operations Chronic use of analgetics due to pelvic pain Pregnancy Operations lasts more than 3 hours
